_meanings:
{@--1@} ({%a%}) To take off,
bear or snatch away, carry off;  
{#paScAtputrErapahftaBaraH#} <ls>V. 3. 1</ls> relieved of the
burden; {#taMtrAdacirApahftaH pawaH#} brought
<ls>P. V. 2. 70</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> ({%b%}) To avert, turn
away; {#vadanamapaharaMtIM#} ({#gOrIM#})  
<ls>Ku. 7. 95</ls> averting or turning away her
face. ({%c%}) To rob, plunder, steal.
